aside.div: Ashford School > Important Message Breakfast and Lunch Available:

header.h2: Important Message Breakfast and Lunch Available:

div.p: To support families while school is closed in an effort to slow the spread of COVID-19 the cafeteria will be providing breakfast and lunch for any family who has at least one student at Ashford School regardless of income. Families can have breakfast and lunch dropped off at home while school is closed.Â Pick up is no longer available. Delivery is usually between 10:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. If we attempt to deliver meals and there is no one home, the meals will be returned to the school and sent to your house the next day. If you live in an apartment building, please be watching and come outside to get the meals as the driver will not be coming into any buildings. Boxes will have enough meals to get your children to the next drop off date.Â Â If you are at work and need the meals delivered to your home please call Ashford Social Services at (860)487-4417 and leave a message or emailÂ mmcdonough@ashfordct.org.
